column2: Papa Bear, Papa Bear, do you read? Alpha squad here. Ritter Farm is cleared of Reds. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. These nameless houses at the second objective are under our control. Over.
Alpha to Papa Bear. Hoenig Farm is ours. Over.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. The town of Marum is FRG territory once more. Over.
Affirmative, Objective One is done. We can see the smoke columns from here. Papa Bear out.
Understood, Alpha. Nice work. HQ out.
Roger that, Alpha. Third objective is down. Proceed. Papa Bear out.
Acknowledged, Alpha One. Good job. HQ out.
Papa Bear to Alpha. Your mission is complete. Excellent work. This is Papa Bear, signing out.
